description: Listed only by Wedgwood, who says: Clariana - Clariona. Very rare. 8 ft. (1) A metal Gamba of ringing keen tone. Brooklyn Tabernacle, U.S.A. (Jardine & Co.); (2) An Echo Dulciana.
